items.name: local-business-scrape
items.description: Scrape local business listings from Google Maps via Serper Places API and export to CSV.

items.name: price-comparison
items.description: Compare prices for a specific product across sellers using Serper search snippets, localized to the user's country, language and currency.

items.name: product-review-research
items.description: Gather trusted public reviews and opinions about a product, service, or topic from social media destinations.

items.name: public-web-research
items.description: Research publicly available information by combining fast structured search with selective browser deep-dives.
